title: Seller Management System â€“ UI Revamp
description: This PRD defines a UI-only refresh for the existing internal Seller Management System. All functionality, data flow, and business logic are already implemented and must remain unchanged. The goal is to improve visual clarity, consistency, and usability using shadcn/ui components.
constraints: Do not modify backend logic, APIs, or database schema
Do not introduce new features or remove existing functionality
All changes must be limited to UI and layout
ui_goals: Make the interface visually clean and modern
Improve readability for dense operational data
Reduce cognitive load for account managers
Ensure consistent spacing, typography, and interaction patterns

requirements: Introduce a consistent page layout with header, content area, and optional sidebar
Apply consistent spacing and alignment across all pages
Use shadcn/ui layout patterns and Tailwind utilities
Render seller list using shadcn/ui Table component
Use clear column headers and row spacing
Add subtle hover and focus states for rows
Ensure long text is truncated with tooltips where necessary
Split seller profile into clearly defined sections (Details, Documents, Payments, Notes)
Use shadcn/ui Card components to group related information
Maintain consistent section headings and spacing
Display documents in a structured table layout
Columns must include file name, tag, and link
Use shadcn/ui Badge component for document tags
Use shadcn/ui Button or Link styling for clickable document links
Refactor all forms to use shadcn/ui Form, Input, Select, and Textarea components
Ensure consistent label placement and validation messaging
Clearly indicate optional fields
Use shadcn/ui Textarea for note fields
Ensure adequate height and spacing for readability
Maintain visual separation from other form elements
Use shadcn/ui components for loading states, empty states, and error states
Display clear empty-state messages when no data is present
Avoid raw browser alerts

visual_guidelines: Prefer neutral color palette with subtle accents
UI should feel professional and efficient rather than decorative
success_criteria: All screens use shadcn/ui components consistently
UI is visually cleaner and easier to scan than before
No functional or behavioral regressions are introduced
Account managers can perform the same tasks with improved clarity
